1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mughaffal narrated that :the Prophet prohibited that a man should urinate in his bathing area. And he said: "It will only cause misgivings." [He said:] There are narrations on This topic from "a man from among the Companions of the Prophet

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْبَوْلِ فِي الْمُغْتَسَلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related That It Is Disliked To Urinate In The Washing Area
